articles.title: Jesse Marsch's passing principle is admirable but there's a right time and place to implement it - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Emirates Stadium, against an Arsenal front three relentless in their efforts to put opposing defenders under pressure, wasn't the place.
articles.content:
It was almost like Jesse Marsch was oblivious to what was happening.
In many ways, you have to admire the Leeds managers devotion to his passing principles. But theres a time and place.
